page.title: 06Wormley
page.content: In this area we discovered quite a lot of shops, mostly food shops, and quite a few Petrol Stations and Newsagents. There are also plenty of schools in the near vicinity. There are lots of playing fields and a Sports Ground, and the area is mostly shops and housing establishments. The Lido (part of the Lea (or Lee) Valley Park) is in the North East of this area. There is a college in the South of the area, and also nurseries. There is a railway service running along the Eastern side of Wormley, and the station is near the Lido. The schools in Wormley that were surveyed were all middle or secondary.
